page.title: 14Dartmouth Castle.
page.content: We talked to the custodian,the Castle is now run by English Heritage,which is the Historic Buildings and Monuments Commission. E.H. now runs 126 national monuments,in '83,the castle was the 42nd most visited,in '84,the 32nd.E.H.'s aim is to make the building more commercial,so that the shop is raising more money from customers.The site has examples of 600 years of coastal defence and weapons and possibly there will soon be a larger exhibition and more explanations and labelling in the Castle.The Castle Battery may also become part of the public area. The Castle staff's busiest months are August,then July,September,June.They work 9.30-18.30,and after that they have to polish and dust the inside of the castle and do the gardening.They expect 35-40,000 visitors this year.
